body: Like how the fuck is the daughter the older lady's first love if she fell in love with the black haired chick way before even meeting the daughter, the writing is just so unbelievably garbage.

I kinda hate this story, too many bullshit love Triangles or fucking hexagons are whatever the fuck else. Like the whole part of the story with the mom, the daughter, and the two girls from the beginning who are dating and their partner switch foursome was just painful to read, and now despite everything that went on now the daughter is in love with the black haired girls girlfriend? It makes no sense and I genuinely have no idea whats happening anymore, I like the beginning where they were all helping each other sort out their feelings but then devolves into this lesbian polygamist colony where there's no real love or commitment and only last. 8/10 art and lewdness 4/10 story and characters.
I feel like the author forgot about the original couple
Can't wait for the next chapter, I like this story.
Idk why but.... The last one made me cry😢😢😢
Finally they upload the full collection
